title: What a Character!

speakers.name: Matt "Kelly" Williams
speakers.bio: Matt Williams always wanted to be a Renaissance Person. Maybe one day he will be. In the meantime, he does photography, designs tabletop games, reads, cooks, weaves, hacks, and spends time with his wife and daughter in Columbus, OH.

excerpt:
What do games, stories, books, movies, and comics all have in common?

Characters

In this dive you will get hands on practice creating characters, from start to finish.  Along the way you'll envision their world, family, friends, society, motivations, quirks, and more!

Award winning comic book...
description:
What do games, stories, books, movies, and comics all have in common?

Characters

In this dive you will get hands on practice creating characters, from start to finish.  Along the way you'll envision their world, family, friends, society, motivations, quirks, and more!

Award winning comic book artist, Althea "Quill the Kidzilla" Seilhan will be a co-presenter
